instructions: Focus on security vulnerabilities, architectural issues, and code quality. Flag any hardcoded secrets, SQL injection risks, or missing authentication immediately. This is an ERP system - pay special attention to financial calculation accuracy and data integrity.
ignorePatterns:
*.md
*.txt
package-lock.json
*.lock
dist/**
build/**
node_modules/**
.git/**
coverage/**
*.test.*
*.spec.*
__tests__/**
data/*.db

rules.rule: Avoid 'any' type - use specific types or 'unknown' with type guards. Always define return types for functions.
Never use eval(), new Function(), or innerHTML with user input. Flag dangerouslySetInnerHTML with dynamic content.
All financial calculations must use precise decimal handling. Validate all user inputs before processing.
SQL queries must use parameterized statements - never string concatenation. Flag any string formatting in database queries.
No hardcoded secrets, API keys, passwords, or credentials.
Error messages must not leak stack traces, SQL queries, or internal paths.
